dc_title_s: Sketch showing location of riparian monuments, Borough of Edgewater, 1906
dc_description_s: Sketch showing the location of the riparian lines along the Hudson River for various property locations in the borough of Edgewater|Source map supplied by New Jersey Department of Environmental Protection|Monuments as shown are same as originally or by J.S. Payne on sketch entitled Map of Lands Underwater situated at Pleasant Valley, Aug 1891
